languages.text: {n}Гетка Зауэрбэк — словно юное отражение своего отца, стоит чуть в стороне, рядом с матерью. Дорогое, но лаконичное платье только подчеркивает ослепительную красоту Регины, супруги Махария Зауэрбэка.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Гетка Зауэрбек — словно юное отражение своего отца, стоит чуть в стороне, рядом с матерью. Дорогое, но лаконичное платье только подчеркивает ослепительную красоту Регины, супруги Махария Зауэрбека.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Hetka Sauerback, looking like a younger copy of his father, stands at a slight distance, close to his mother. An expensive yet understated dress serves to highlight the dazzling beauty of Macharius's wife, Regina Sauerback.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Гетка Зауэрбэк — словно юное отражение своего отца, стоит чуть в стороне, рядом с матерью. Дорогое, но лаконичное платье только подчеркивает ослепительную красоту Регины, супруги Махария Зауэрбэка.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Hetka Sauerback, looking like a younger reflection of his father, stands slightly to the side, close to his mother. An expensive, yet laconic dress serves to highlight the dazzling beauty of Macharias's wife, Regina Sauerback.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ヘトカ・ザウアーバックは父親をそのまま若くしたような外見をしており、父親からは少し離れた場所、母親のそばに立っている。高価ながら地味な服に目もくらむような美貌を引き立てられているのは、マハリウスの妻、レジーナ・ザウアーバックだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Hetka Sauerback, looking like a younger copy of his father, stands at a slight distance, close to his mother. An expensive yet understated dress serves to highlight the dazzling beauty of Macharius's wife, Regina Sauerback.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ヘトカ・ザウアーバックは父親をそのまま若くしたような外見をしており、父親からは少し離れた場所、母親のそばに立っている。高価ながら地味な服に目もくらむような美貌を引き立てられているのは、マハリウスの妻、レジーナ・ザウアーバックだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}赫特卡·苏尔贝克简直就是他父亲小一号的翻版。他紧挨着自己的母亲，站在稍远一点的地方。马卡里乌斯的妻子蕾吉娜·苏尔贝克身着一袭华贵但低调的礼服，更衬得她艳光四射、美丽动人。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Hetka Sauerback, looking like a younger copy of his father, stands at a slight distance, close to his mother. An expensive yet understated dress serves to highlight the dazzling beauty of Macharius's wife, Regina Sauerback.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}赫特卡·苏尔贝克简直就是他父亲小一号的翻版。他紧挨着自己的母亲，站在稍远一点的地方。马卡里乌斯的妻子蕾吉娜·苏尔贝克身着一袭华贵但低调的礼服，更衬得她艳光四射、美丽动人。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Hetka Sauerback, portrait craché de son père, se tient légèrement en retrait, près de sa mère. Quant à l'épouse de Macharius, Régina Sauerback, elle est parée d'une robe de belle facture, mais suffisamment discrète pour mettre sa beauté en valeur.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Hetka Sauerback, looking like a younger copy of his father, stands at a slight distance, close to his mother. An expensive yet understated dress serves to highlight the dazzling beauty of Macharius's wife, Regina Sauerback.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Hetka Sauerback, portrait craché de son père, se tient légèrement en retrait, près de sa mère. Quant à l'épouse de Macharius, Régina Sauerback, elle est parée d'une robe de belle facture, mais suffisamment discrète pour mettre sa beauté en valeur.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Hetka Sauerback, que parece una copia más joven de su padre, se encuentra ligeramente apartado, cerca de su madre. Un vestido caro pero discreto resalta la belleza deslumbrante de Regina Sauerback, esposa de Macharius.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Hetka Sauerback, looking like a younger copy of his father, stands at a slight distance, close to his mother. An expensive yet understated dress serves to highlight the dazzling beauty of Macharius's wife, Regina Sauerback.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Hetka Sauerback, que parece una copia más joven de su padre, se encuentra ligeramente apartado, cerca de su madre. Un vestido caro pero discreto resalta la belleza deslumbrante de Regina Sauerback, esposa de Macharius.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Hetka Sauerback, der wie eine jüngere Kopie seines Vaters aussieht, steht etwas abseits, näher an seiner Mutter. Ein teures, aber dezentes Kleid unterstreicht die blendende Schönheit von Macharius' Gemahlin, Regina Sauerback.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Hetka Sauerback, looking like a younger copy of his father, stands at a slight distance, close to his mother. An expensive yet understated dress serves to highlight the dazzling beauty of Macharius's wife, Regina Sauerback.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Hetka Sauerback, der wie eine jüngere Kopie seines Vaters aussieht, steht etwas abseits, näher an seiner Mutter. Ein teures, aber dezentes Kleid unterstreicht die blendende Schönheit von Macharius' Gemahlin, Regina Sauerback.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Babasına benzerliğiyle göze çarpan Hetka Sauerback, annesinin yanında duruyor. Pahalı ama göze batmayan kıyafeti, Macharius'un karısı Regina Sauerback'in müthiş güzelliğini öne çıkarıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Hetka Sauerback, looking like a younger copy of his father, stands at a slight distance, close to his mother. An expensive yet understated dress serves to highlight the dazzling beauty of Macharius's wife, Regina Sauerback.{/n}
